item.title: Senator’s RISE Act would require AI developers to list training data, evaluation methods in exchange for ‘safe harbor’ from lawsuits
item.description: The developer must also publish known failure modes, keep all documentation current, and push updates within 30 days of a version change.

item.title: Red team AI now to build safer, smarter models tomorrow
item.description: AI models are under attack. Traditional defenses are failing. Discover why red teaming is crucial for thwarting adversarial threats.

item.title: Meta’s new world model lets robots manipulate objects in environments they’ve never encountered before
item.description: A robot powered by V-JEPA 2 can be deployed in a new environment and successfully manipulate objects it has never encountered before.

item.title: Cloud collapse: Replit and LlamaIndex knocked offline by Google Cloud identity outage
item.description: Many AI developers started their morning amid a Google Cloud outage affecting many of the tools they use to build products.

item.title: TensorWave deploys AMD Instinct MI355X GPUs in its cloud platform
item.description: TensorWave, a leader in AMD-powered AI infrastructure solutions, today announced the deployment of AMD Instinct MI355X GPUs in its high-performance cl...
